name: brfy-issue-example
description: An example of Browserify not recognizing a module in a Browserify bundle.
author: Fleeting Clouds

scripts.clean: rm -f public/common.js && rm -f public/beep.js && rm -f public/boop.js
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean & npm run clean-tidy & npm run clean-pkgs
scripts.brfy: npm install && npm run brfy-common && npm run brfy-boop && npm run brfy-beep
